About Me

BIO

I work as a software engineer in San Francisco, previously in Los Angeles and Honolulu. I'm passionate about food, tech, finance, and traveling!

O2znz

Frontend Software Engineer

O2znz is a lodging application that allows users to list their homes for rent.

DDRC

Backend Software Engineer

DDRC is a lodging application that allows users to list their homes for rent.

Fungry

Fullstack Software Engineer

Fungry is a web application that allows you to journal all your food thoughts using Google Places API for location search, MongoDB to store your reviews, Express server, and Node.js.
